press_lid.description: Press the lid of the CoffeeMachine.

press_lid_again.description: Press the lid of the CoffeeMachine once again for any functionality checkup.

press_the_lid.description: Press down the lid of the CoffeeMachine.

multiple_press.description: Press the lid of the CoffeeMachine multiple times for checking functionality.

clean_coffee_machine_body.description: Clean the body of the CoffeeMachine to remove dust or any other particles.

clean_coffee_machine_body_again.description: Clean the body of the CoffeeMachine once more to maintain cleanliness and hygiene.

wipe_and_press.description: First, wipe the body of the CoffeeMachine and then press the lid for the machine's preparation.

wipe_body.description: Wipe the external body of the CoffeeMachine to clean dust or any other particles.

wipe_body_twice.description: Clean the body of the CoffeeMachine twice for better hygiene.

wipe_then_press.description: First clean the CoffeeMachine's body before pressing the lid.

clean_whole_coffee_machine.description: Clean the entire CoffeeMachine including the body and lid.

press_lid_and_clean_coffee_machine_body.description: Press the lid of the CoffeeMachine and then clean the CoffeeMachine's body.

clean_coffee_machine_body_and_press_lid.description: First clean the CoffeeMachine's body, then press the lid

clean_whole_coffee_machine_again.description: Clean the entire coffee machine including the body and the lid once again to ensure its cleanliness.

press_and_wipe.description: First press the lid of the CoffeeMachine and then wipe the machine's body.

wipe_then_press.description: First wipe the body of the CoffeeMachine, then press the lid for the machine's functionality check.

complete_status.description: The CoffeeMachine is in its ideal state and no action is required.

clean_and_press.description: Clean the body and press the lid of the CoffeeMachine.

press_and_clean.description: Press the lid of the CoffeeMachine and then clean the machine's body.

double_clean_and_press.description: Clean the machine body and lid twice and then press the lid.

clean_press_clean.description: Clean the CoffeeMachine's body and lid, press the lid, and clean again for maintenance.

full_clean_then_press.description: Clean the body and lid of the CoffeeMachine thoroughly, and then press the lid.

status_update.description: The CoffeeMachine is in enhanced status and no immediate action is needed.
